p: Figure 2 shows the effects of RC supplementation on the antioxidant-regulated genes of the hens at 12 weeks. The expression levels of GST, GCLC, HO-1, SOD1, and SOD2 were significantly ( P=0.0024, 0.0367, 0.0044, <0.0001, and <0.0001, respectively) higher in hens supplemented with 2% RC, whereas the 1% RC treatment group demonstrated significantly higher expression of GCLC, HO-1, SOD1, and SOD2, compared to the control. Additionally, the 0.5% RC group expressed significantly increased levels of SOD1 and SOD2 compared to the control.
